video.title: Chopped Collection
video.synopsis: It's all about skill, speed, and ingenuity in this cooking-competition show where up-and-coming chefs turn everyday items into an extraordinary meal.

episodes.synopsis: Fans on Pinterest, Facebook and Twitter suggest the ingredients for this Viewers' Choice competition, resulting in possibly the cruelest baskets ever.
episodes.title: Viewers' Choice Baskets

episodes.synopsis: Amateur chefs find a daunting sea creature when they open up the first basket, then grapple with an unfamiliar tuber in the entrée round.
episodes.title: Amazing Amateurs

episodes.synopsis: Four chefs who've shed serious pounds open a basket to find a fatty protein that challenges them to stick to their healthier-food philosophies.
episodes.title: Cook Your Butt Off!

episodes.synopsis: The competitors have to work with bacon popcorn in the first round; in the entrée round, an injury causes one chef to lose valuable time.
episodes.title: Cleaver Fever

episodes.synopsis: Four teenage chefs invade the Chopped Kitchen and impress the judges with appetizers made from tuna and cereal.
episodes.title: Teen Invasion

episodes.synopsis: The chefs are surprised to discover a decadent sweet creation in every basket, including a towering cake in the appetizer round.
episodes.title: Sweet Invasion

episodes.synopsis: Two pairs of brothers battle it out, taking on falooda noodles in the first round and steak and cinnamon rolls in the second.
episodes.title: Chopped Family Feud

episodes.synopsis: The chefs grapple with puzzling ingredients in the appetizer round, then open the second basket to find a gargantuan seafood surprise.
episodes.title: Break a Crab Leg!

episodes.synopsis: Four chefs in the booming food truck business find two flavored meats in the appetizer basket and a sugary powder in the second round.
episodes.title: Keep on Trucking

episodes.synopsis: The competitors find food scraps in the baskets, starting with herb stems and what's left of a filleted fish in the appetizer round.
episodes.title: Wasted!

episodes.synopsis: Four athletes who feel at home in the kitchen battle it out for charity and face an entrée basket that includes chocolate-covered marshmallows.
episodes.title: Sports Stars

episodes.synopsis: In a champagne and caviar appetizer round, one chef makes a generous choice; chefs pair seafood with pancake mix in the entrée round.
episodes.title: Brunch Boxes

episodes.synopsis: The chefs receive calves' livers and ranch dressing in the first round; a small bird and a citrusy spice make for an odd combination in round two.
episodes.title: Liver and Learn

episodes.synopsis: In the first round, the chefs have to make cotton candy and corn dogs delicious; snow cones and popcorn pop up in the dessert round.
episodes.title: Circus Spectacular

episodes.synopsis: Chefs tangle with pasta dough in the first round; the tasty Italian trend continues with veal chops and bottarga in the next basket.
episodes.title: Competition Italiano

episodes.synopsis: Four former runners-up seeking redemption begin their battle with a faux meat and a hot mustard in the appetizer basket.
episodes.title: Redeemed or Re-Chopped?

episodes.synopsis: The chefs must make chocolate work in the first two savory courses. In the dessert round, cherries and German layer cake are on the menu.
episodes.title: Chocolate Competition

episodes.synopsis: With a $40,000 scholarship on the line, four teenage competitors open up the first basket and find a sweet drink and a juicy fruit.
episodes.title: Teen Talent

episodes.synopsis: When the clock starts ticking down, the chefs must rush to make appetizers with pickled pigs' feet and sweet potato chips.
episodes.title: Hoofin' It

episodes.synopsis: Chefs make creative use of ingredients that are usually thrown out, including juicer pulp, tea bags and some paltry scraps of poultry.
episodes.title: Waste Not

episodes.synopsis: Chefs learn they'll be making burgers for every round, including dessert; little quail eggs in the entrée basket lead to big headaches.
episodes.title: All-Burger Meal!

episodes.synopsis: Chefs are brewing up all three rounds devoted to beer, which they must pair with sausages in the appetizer course and pretzels for dessert.
episodes.title: Beer Here!

episodes.synopsis: In the first round, one of the competitors takes a loose interpretation of the theme; pizzas in the second round feature some unusual toppings.
episodes.title: Pizza Perfect

episodes.synopsis: It's bacon for every course as the chefs incorporate the pork product into dishes made with apple chips, dried cherries and French toast.
episodes.title: Bacon Baskets!

episodes.synopsis: Chefs try to figure out what to do with so-called 100-year-old eggs. Then, mango pudding must make its way into the chefs' main course dishes.
episodes.title: An Egg Up
